reviews.text: Absolutely delicious from start to finish! The food is authentic and full of flavor ‚Äî you can taste the freshness in every bite. The pasta is cooked perfectly, sauces are rich and balanced, and the portions are generous without being over the top. The staff is friendly, our waiter Serafin was very attentive, and they made us feel like family. Cozy atmosphere, great wine selection, and truly one of the best Italian spots around. Can‚Äôt wait to go back!

The $22 wrap Was nothing like it was described on the menu had very little chicken strips. A couple of pieces of mozzarella, old, grape tomatoes and no mixed greens. Just lettuce on a big thick piece of bread. The quality of the clams had a weird taste, everything Served was sub par.. The Service lousy, the soda lines need cleaning. Gordon Ramsey needs to visit you guys. It‚Äôs a total rip off. Most things on the menu are not available.

Food always good, only negative was asked if we wanted bread basket instead of just bringing it and only gave 2 pieces of onion bread for two people without any sliced Italian bread also asked if we wanted drinks we ordered 2 sodas but didn‚Äôt bring any water to the table
Serafin was an amazing server and very accommodating
Wonderful as always! Especially the zeppole!
Great food, service by Carlos, and atmosphere. Thank you.
My first time having lunch here and our server Serafin was amazing. Highly recommend
The pizza is very delicious here. The people are nice and welcoming. Looking forward to coming back with friends and family next time.
Carlos was great

Great meal based upon recommendations from
Our server Carlos. He knows what his patrons like and provides attentive and friendly prompt service. Carlos is one of our favorite servers, along with Andres. They keep us looking forward to our nights out at La Villa Howard Beach.
Food and service was excellent. Serafin was a great server.
Always a great dinner, from onion bread to start to meatballs, beet salad, grilled chicken arugula wrap, never disappoints!!!
L Serafin was great server, great food

Lavilla is one of the best Italian restaurants that me and my family enjoy and appreciate the best quality ingredients that you can get right from Italy. It‚Äôs a place that I trust and a place. There is no other place like this one. Everything is imported best of the best.
Food was delicious and our server Andres was amazing! He was very attentive the entire time we were there. We will definitely be back!
Love lavilla the most delicious high quality food in howard beach n Carlos is a great kind waiter the ultimate professional
Too salty
Very. Nice . The waiter Carlos was very good

This is one of the greatest places!!! The food is the best ever! Carlos was our server he was so accommodating pleasant‚Ä¶ an excellent waiter! We will definitely be back! It‚Äôs our once or sometimes twice a week spot!
Great place and excellent food

We had a wonderful lunch there.
Our waiter was top notch.

Amazingg amazing entrees try the veal and pepperoni wood fired pizza amazing ü§© Andreas best waiter was attentive and good customer service. dine in or order and pick up the food is amazing fresh ingredients. Romantic vibes at night.
Andreas was excellent. Service was outstanding. No issues. Food was perfect from salad to dessert. Can‚Äôt wait to return.
Serafin is one of the best waitress i know. I know him for more than 10 years. He is very polite and knows how to take care if clients.
great food
Nos atendi√≥ Carlos muy buen servicio muy amable gracias y la comida deliciosa !!!
Great service. Jayna.  good personality great human being
Yummy!

Having this restaurant in the neighborhood is the ULTIMATE treat. Always such a classy and delicious experience. The ingredients and food are top notch and so fresh. I also really like the classy music they play inside.
Serafin was very polite & kind. Thankyou for the great service!
The service is always great! Andres is amazing and very kind!
Excellent  service, from the waiter Cerafin
Luis is a great server, a little cold in here so it cooled my pizza

The food was yummy and the portions were HUGE! We were stuffed but still found room for dessert! The chocolate cake was rich and delicious.  The apple crip got mixed reviews.  More graham crackers were needed for the crust and the apples were too tender. The Calamari, perfection! The salad and the meatballs were yummy. Ask for prices when making substitutions, you will be charged on top of the upcharge for pasta with any ofvthe entr√©e. We asked for garlic and oil instead of marinara,  $11! The bread, DELICIOUS! I wish it would have come with sauce but I saved a piece to go with my meatballs.  The waiter didn't really check on us. We got one drink and our  glasses sat empty until we had to call someone over to order something else. We were a party of 6 and our bill was about $450/with tip. We tipped $70.
Our waiter Andreas was amazing. He made our meal very pleasant.
Ate outside. Food fresh, creative, attentive service, authentic Italian.
Great food and service!!!! Thank you Seraf√≠n
Serafin waited on us and he was extremely diligent and efficient.

First time having the food there today Saturday 9-27-25 130 Pm the Alfredo was a bit salty and not well done as requested. Ordered with Mariana for penne Alfredo well done not Al dente.  And got Al dente cooked.

I just thought they would throw the pasta in the skillet then pour Alfredo sauce and let it simmer or cook until it start to bubble up which would then be evenly coated pasta with sauce instead of having to stir it yourself.  that‚Äôs how it came penne with a sauce over it instead of it the pasta sitting in the sauce.

The onion bread is good and focaccia!

I expected the food to be really good and pleasing but got disappointed with how the food really was

*** if you get Alfredo Sauce PASTA MAKE SURE YOU TELL THEM NO PROSCIUTTO.

The food is always delicious!
Waiters Andreas P and Serafin were
fantastic as well!

Wow, exceeded my expectations! I was expecting a small brick and mortar shop but as soon as I walked in I loved the atmosphere. They have ambient lighting inside and looks very high end w gorgeous tan booths. There is an outside seating section as well w large umbrellas for comfortable eating. The food though, phenomenal! I had the personal size Napoletana pizza and it‚Äôs amazing! Fresh out of the oven,  thin and chewy and oh so scrumptious. Five big stars!

I‚Äôve been dining at La Villa in Howard Beach for years. I travel from afar since they have  consistently good service and good food. In the warmer months I enjoy eating outside on the patio. Inside, they have a pizza counter with some seating overlooking their pizza oven, but you can certainly sit in the main dining room or back room when it‚Äôs open. During my most recent visit Marisa and Andres served us and were very attentive and helpful. The only area of improvement is their music selection. I love that it‚Äôs mostly Italian, but perhaps they can choose some more lively beats.

I frequent this place, and there's a good reason for that. The food really is delicious. Overpriced? Also yes. I enjoy selecting from their little pizza assortment at the counter, which is unique to the other pizzerias in the area. The Romana stuffed slice I've been getting for over 20 years and it's still impressive. Marinara, Caprese, Zucchini slices and mini pies are all hits as well. They did away with the white clam sauce, so disappointed but I heard you  an catch it on their daily specials every now and then. Julianne Vegetables and Chicken Parmigiana entrees were delicious.

1/9/25: Always a nice go to when you're seeking a quick dinner closeby. The dining room was pretty quiet when we went around 4:30. The service was up to par as usual and the food equally up to standards.

Amazing Italian food! The ingredients are super fresh and delicious. First time was an incredible impression and we‚Äôre definitely coming back for more. Must try the tiramisu. We were served with 2  spoons but I at all of it. Everything was scrumptious.

Gorgeous local spot. Been ordering pizza from them for decades and decided to do a family girls night for the holidays on Friday. Food was great but even better was the staff. Amazing, friendly and generous. I loved that my family raved about my recommendation to go there. Keep up the great work!!

Ps- the Zeppoli‚Äôs were like pillowy pockets of heaven üå≤‚ô•Ô∏è

First time here and overall the look and feel of the place was very nice and modern esp for dine-in. The wait staff was excellent, had no issues here. They offered a traditional menu of Italian food and many daily specials which they change often it seems and that‚Äôs great for variety.

I had the baked little neck clams and they were good, the lasagna and it was delicious and also they vegetable soup which had incredibly flavor. For dessert we had the cr√®me br√ªl√©e cheesecake which was also good.

It doesn‚Äôt seem they are very big on appearance when it comes to food but if your looking for a good spot to sit down and some good to enjoy, you won‚Äôt go wrong here.

The food was delicious, the wait wasn‚Äôt long for takeout and it was a bit packed. The staff was friendly and attentive. My only complaint is the smell of firewood. It was really strong, I know they use wood to cook but I left smelling like I was at a camp fire.

Just had a delicious dinner... The food and service was amazing.. Jayna our server was awesome... She regularly checked on us to make sure we had everything we needed....will definitely be coming here again and looking for Jayna.

La villa is my favorite neighborhood spot! I‚Äôve been coming here since I was a kid. The quality and consistency is always on point. The food is just so fresh and delicious! Andreas, our waiter, has been here for years and is very accommodating and friendly. Highly recommended restaurant!

Jayna is one of our favorite waitresses at La Villa Pizza. She is so attentive and welcoming and knows exactly how we like everything. We don‚Äôt even have to put in an order she knows what we want even before we have a seat. Great service, friendly, kind and pleasant.
The best italian restaurant in howard beach! Their specials, wraps, soups, pizza, you name it are delicious!!! Quality!!!

My first time here with my future wife and I must say the food was fantastic! Waiter was very attentive, food came out fast, and the mostly important part the food was fresh! We will definitely be back!

Not the worst and not the best grandma skice pizza, but good. Service was just okay. The lead person or host wasn't warm but he gave us very basic hospitality. However, our waiter was wonderful. Unfortunately she was responsible for waiting on both inside and outside customers. They needed another waiter not fair to her. Then to top the dining experience, their was a couple in the men's bathroom having a discussion or doing who knows what. I will not be returning unless I had an emergency need to eat.
PS. it does have a beautiful decore.

First time at this location. I had been to others in Brooklyn and Howard Beach years ago. I had a grandma slice which tasted good but the crust was very pale and dry which was surprising. I also sampled a regular Napolitano slice. It had a nice balanced flavor and a better crust than the grandma. Overall a good visit, but not quite as I had remembered. I think New Park nearby has a better slice, in my opinion.

I am the most particular eater and won't order food from many places...this is my go to when I want great food...love this place..never disappoints...staff is so friendly and the food is delicious...the ceaser dressing is the absolute best I ever had...keep up the great work on serving delicious food
Very nice service from our server Jayna, food is a little to much for one person but is delicious the place is so clean and friendly with seating outside and was very pleasant thank you

Pizza was good. The sauce was good, the cheese was alright. The wood cooked dough was great. Pepperoni could of been more flavorful. Customer service was great. Indoor and outdoor tables were clean. The ambiance gives you cozy feeling. They‚Äôre in a shopping mall so parking can feel crazy at times. This pizza is worth a first time trip and maybe a second if you‚Äôre near by. Would I take a 1hr ride to try this pizza. Absolutely not. Nothing special but it is a great pizza joint. Like many customers have stated, its very EXPENSIVE. The pizza does not justify the prize. You‚Äôre paying neighborhood premium. I think you can get a better deal at New Park Pizza that is a few minutes away(strictly Pizza experience).

We love la Villa! Is our favorite restaurant in the area, Quality and consistency over the years. The soups  are exceptional and love the salads as well. What I like the best is that you can actually have other authentic Italian dishes that aren‚Äôt pizza or pasta. A very good option for the neighborhood.
Delicious tasty food and great service. Perfect for lunch or dinner

La Villa Pizzeria has a nice atmosphere and decent service, but the food left a bit to be desired. The penne vodka lacked the depth of flavor I expected from an Italian spot, and the pizza could‚Äôve used a crispier crust. That said, it‚Äôs still a step up from places like Olive Garden, so if you‚Äôre in the area and craving Italian, it‚Äôs worth checking out‚Äîbut don‚Äôt expect to be blown away.
First impression when you walk in - wonderful aroma. Something tasty is cooking here! The food was really good. The service was friendly and professional.

We absolutely love this place.  We eat there 2-3 times a week because it‚Äôs our ‚Äúgo to‚Äù place.  The staff is friendly, the food is delicious and consistent and the atmosphere is a community favorite.  They are flexible with their menu items and can accommodate every request.  Most people, however, will find it pricey.
The most wonderful experience ever!!!

So nice to be back at LaVilla's! I can't believe it has been almost 25 years since we've had a chance to visit and it still felt like home! I loved that they still have the rear dining room although the outdoor patio looked so inviting as well! I knew I could count on them for delicious brocoli rabe dishes and chicken parmigiana, and they held true! I am so happy I finally had a chance to bring family to try LaVilla's! Hope to visit more frequently, again.
Great pizza! The Little neck clam appetizer was delicious. The same entr√©e was too salty. The bread is the absolute star of this restaurant. My mom had veal. She loved it.
Enjoyed myself here. Outdoor patio area is nice meal time. Fantastic music and thanks to Jayna great service as well. Plan to come back in future for another great meal.
